proposal: Understanding the power of LocalAI in democratizing AI by offering a free, Open Source alternative to OpenAI is truly impressive. With 251 holders in the ETH network, it's clear there's a strong community behind this vision. Imagine integrating our B2B tools to further empower your community, allowing anyone to deploy their own DEX or Lottery, sharing revenue while enhancing LocalAI's ecosystem. Let's make decentralization practical together.
